item.description:
Let's meet at 1:00 at the B Bay Trainbridge entrance of the Canal and walk to the herring run and back...( 7 miles).

Then after we could go to Nick's Pizza or BBay House of Pizza, or even just Dunkin's for coffee after if people want to grab a snack or warm up. 

Look for Joanna in the Parking lot by the Bathrooms. Anyone have a flag we can mount somewhere?  I have to get one made or buy one somewhere for "meeting up" in parking lots.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet near the restrooms facing the canal.
item.why: Every time I do walk the Canal I think, "this is so pretty, why don't I do this more often?"... Feel free to bring your inline skates if you prefer.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Canal walk - from th Train Bridge (RollerBladers welcome)
